user.description: Bachelor's degree in Software Engineering with over 4 years of experience in web development, specializing in both frontend and backend. In 2021, together with my team, I developed an innovative solution that earned us first place in a Virtual Hackathon (#ReactivatePerú), demonstrating our ability to work under pressure, collaborate effectively, and solve complex problems. Proficient in solving complex challenges and implementing significant improvements for the companies I have worked with. Skilled in various technologies and frameworks, delivering innovative and efficient solutions that optimize processes and create value. I stand out for my proactive approach, strong technical skills, and ability to adapt to dynamic environments.
